description.en:
Combined theoretical (30%) and practical (70%) study. 
Compartments of the studio:
Acquisition of environmental data.
Specifics and acquisition of spatial data.
Reliability and uncertainties of data, spatial data quality.
Data interoperability.
Geoprocessing
description.et:
Kombineeritud teoreetiline (30%) ja praktiline õpe (70%). 
Stuudio allosad:
Keskkonnaandmete hõive.
Ruumiandmete iseärad ja hõive.
Andmete usaldusväärsus ja kvaliteet.
Andmete ristkasutus.
Ruumianalüüs

objectives.en: To provide the student knowledge of spatial data acquisition and management, and basic spatial data analysis skills.
objectives.et: Anda õppijale arusaamine ja oskused ruumiandmete haldamiseks ning esmane ruumiandmete analüüsi oskus.

learning_outcomes.en:
- Understands and is able to apply methods of data acquisition in different fields
- Is able to design and manage spatial database: knows the formats and software of important spatial data and databases
- Knows spatial coordinate systems and is able to choose correct coordinate system according to region and putpose
- Is able to use and create metadata based on suitable metadata standards, demonstrates the understating of the need for metadata
- Knows main spatial data standards and is able to estimate the spatial data quality
- Is able to independently pose and solve a problem by using spatial data from different geographic regions or global data
- Knows and is able to consider the regional/cultural and sectoral differences in applying geospatial analysis 
- Understands the global challenges and is able to put them into local/regional context and provide solutions by using geospatial analysis
- Demonstrates critical thinking and ability to work interdisciplinary teams when working with spatial data
- Is able to communicate and visualise the spatial data in a meaningful way
learning_outcomes.et: Teab erinevat tüüpi ruumiandmete tüüpe ja oskab neid kasutada, on suuteline kavandama ja rakendama ruumiandmekogu: tunneb olulisi andmete ja andmebaaside formaate ja tarkvarasid, kasutada ja hallata ruumiandmebaasi. Teab koordinaatsüsteeme ja oskab  valida vajadusele vastavalt õiget koordinaatsüsteemi. Oskab kasutada ja luua metaandmeid. Teab ruumiandmete standardeid ja oskab hinnata ruumiandmete kvaliteeti. Oskab kasutada peamisi ruumianalüüsi meetodeid ja analüüsivahendeid.

description.et:
Õpimapp koosneb iseseisvate tööde aruannetest, lühitestidest, lõputöö aruandest ning ePortfooliost. Hinnatakse õpiväljundite saavutatust protsentides. (50% koguhindest)
Study portfolio includes reports of independent tasks, small tests, final project and ePortfolio. Achievement of results is evaluated in percent (50% of the final grade)

Õppeaine peamise teooria osa teadmiste kontroll (25% koguhindest). Vähemalt 50% peab olema saavutatud kursuse läbimiseks.
Test for the theoretical knowledge of the course (25% of the final grade). At least 50% of the score has to be achieved to pass the course.

Lõpuprojekt (25%oguhindest)
Final project (25% of the final grade)

grade_preconditions.et:
Jooksvate iseseisvate tööde ja lõputöö sooritamine
Independent tasks and the final project fulfilled and test performed

grade_evaluation.et:
Iseseisvate tööde, kontrolltöö ja lõputöö koondhinne
Summary of independent tasks, test and final project

debt_elimination.et:
Kokkuleppe õppejõuga.
As agreed with the tutors.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
